Making all in ccs

-DHAVE_CONFIG_H -DLINUX=2 -D_REENTRANT -D_XOPEN_SOURCE=500 -D_BSD_SOURCE

jfclere@gmail.com
text:
NONE/lib/iconv???
Something must have been wrong in the configure. How have you configured apr-iconv?
The simple answer is: don't build apr-iconv on Linux, you don't need it.
creator: jorton@redhat.com
